properties.name: jsonrpc.path
properties.description: HTTP endpoint path for JSON-RPC requests. Must start with '/'.

properties.name: jsonrpc.max-batch-size
properties.description: Maximum number of calls allowed in a batch request. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: jsonrpc.max-request-bytes
properties.description: Maximum accepted raw request payload size in bytes. Must be greater than 0.

properties.name: jsonrpc.scan-annotated-methods
properties.description: Scan beans for @JsonRpcMethod and register discovered handlers.

properties.name: jsonrpc.include-error-data
properties.description: Include JsonRpcException data payload in error responses.

properties.name: jsonrpc.metrics-enabled
properties.description: Enable Micrometer metrics interceptor when MeterRegistry is present.

properties.name: jsonrpc.notification-executor-enabled
properties.description: Dispatch notifications through a Spring Executor bean when available.

properties.name: jsonrpc.method-registration-conflict-policy
properties.description: Policy used when a method name is registered more than once.

properties.name: jsonrpc.method-allowlist
properties.description: Allowed JSON-RPC method names. Empty list means allow all. Blank entries are invalid.

properties.name: jsonrpc.method-denylist
properties.description: Denied JSON-RPC method names. Denylist takes precedence over allowlist membership. Blank entries are invalid.
